channel.title: Looking for 1-2 developers
channel.description:
Hello, I am looking for 1 or 2 (experienced!) server devs. it's for an allstar project. It's gonna be huge.
some details:
client base: by mod demolish or whoever made it
MEDIA:
[url=http://postimg.org/image/e0edij2fv/][img]http://s9.postimg.org/e0edij2fv/pica4.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=http://postimg.org/image/kl414i0ud/][img]http://s2.postimg.org/kl414i0ud/pica1.jpg[/img][/url]
__
[url=http://postimg.org/image/tz7zvqkqh/][img]http://s12.postimg.org/tz7zvqkqh/pica2.jpg[/img][/url]
__
[url=http://postimg.org/image/ndvg06y8f/][img]http://s27.postimg.org/ndvg06y8f/pica3.jpg[/img][/url]
Other features:
- Fight pits(on development) - Pest Control(on development) - Castle wars (90% done) - Sorta fixed combat, on allstar you would attack a npc and it would hit you once, and then it would stop. Here it will constantly attack you and chase after you. - Clue scrolls - Working tokkul shop, assault shop (considering adding a donator and voting shop in the future) - Working runecrafting - redone firemaking. near to perfect - all npcs have their correct animations, the hits and drops are realistic. - So much more might wanna update this post a few times. CREDITS:
jagex runefreak10 mod demolish me
Application:
- How long have you been coding? - Show me some proof of your work.
I will PM you if I accept your application.
Thanks, sertan.

Hello, I am looking for 1 or 2 (experienced!) server devs. it’s for an allstar project. It’s gonna be huge.

Other features:

  • Pest Control(on development)
  • Castle wars (90% done)
  • Sorta fixed combat, on allstar you would attack a npc and it would hit you once, and then it would stop. Here it will constantly attack you and chase after you.
